There are multiple websites available to check current car value in United Kingdom.



The best of all is webuyanycar.com for instant valuation.



The other examples are autotrader.com and confused.com.



Checking example BMW with registration MW05 UWP the value of the car is roughly around £3000.



However car with registration KN55 HHA is not worth much in current market.



There are multiple cars available higher than £10k with registrations UI66 RTP and XX12 HTN.
